title: ID Card Template Configuration Schema
description: Schema for configuring ID card template variables

primaryColor.title: Primary Color
primaryColor.description: Primary color used for header, footer, photo border, and photo placeholder icon/text

secondaryColor.title: Secondary Color
secondaryColor.description: Secondary color used for photo placeholder background

textColorForHeaderAndFooter.title: Text Color for Header and Footer
textColorForHeaderAndFooter.description: Text color used for header and footer text, and body background

defaultTextColor.title: Default Text Color
defaultTextColor.description: Default text color used for main content text (name, ID, class, etc.)

defaultLabelColor.title: Default Label Color
defaultLabelColor.description: Default label color used for field labels (NAME, ID Number, Class, etc.)

bloodGroupTextColor.title: Blood Group Text Color
bloodGroupTextColor.description: Text color specifically for blood group value

footerText.title: Footer Text
footerText.description: Footer text to be displayed at the bottom of the card

schoolLogoFileId.title: School Logo for ID Card
schoolLogoFileId.description: File for the school logo image displayed in the header
